alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 3:45PM MDT until May 24 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southeastern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 345 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Agate, or 19 miles northwest of Limon, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Agate around 355 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Deer Trail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
